messages.subject: Re:  2249 - For Betty in PR
messages.msgSnippet: on 8/15/02 2:18 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at ... Betty, Thank you. The channel (s) are cable access stations in the part of CT where I live. If
messages.messageBody:
on 8/15/02 2:18 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> I've made several hour-long TV programs, called "School is
> Hell" and they play regularly on cable access hereabouts. I'm sure those
> make a little Hell for the local school pushers. (anyone want copies?)
>
> Hi dear Ned,
> I want copies of these programs of yours or let me know what the channel is!
>
> A hug from Puerto Rico,
> Betty

Betty,

Thank you. The channel (s) are cable access stations in the part of CT where
I live. If you send me a private email, I'll tell you what the channels are
and the towns where they are received. nedvare@...
For copies, too.
